body.title:
Industrial Automation Engineer
Industrial Automation Engineer with verification
body.description:
About the job
Compensation: $140,000-150,000

Location: Deer Park, Texas

Position: Industrial Automation Engineer

Inceed has partnered with a great company to help find a skilled Industrial Automation Engineer to join their team!

This role is a unique opportunity for an experienced engineer to oversee and support critical automation and control systems projects across multiple facilities, focusing on a range of upgrades and maintenance for automation/control systems in a liquid storage terminal setting. The engineer will leverage their expertise to lead the planning, design, and implementation of control systems migrations and serve as the primary technical authority for automation processes. This is a hands-on position that offers diverse responsibilities and the opportunity to work in a dynamic, safety-conscious environment.

Responsibilities:

Provide subject matter expertise for automation/control systems and instrumentation, ensuring compliance with industry standards and safety requirements.
Act as the primary technical liaison between terminal operations and engineering or customer personnel, managing communication on all automation-related technical matters.
Lead the transition from legacy PLC systems to Emerson DeltaV DCS and SIS systems, taking ownership of project technical planning and monitoring the lifecycle of these systems.
Ensure the maintenance and lifecycle management of all control systems, adhering to established service level agreements and quality standards.
Develop control system schematics, such as Control System Block Diagrams/System Architecture, Network Diagrams, I/O Lists, wiring diagrams, and instrument data sheets.
Participate in safety and hazard analysis reviews, offering insights on instrumentation and control considerations.
Facilitate meetings between automation teams and operations/maintenance to align project specifications with operational needs and industry standards.
Assist with the development of project scopes, proposals, and cost estimates, supporting justification for project investment.
Oversee vendor selection, bid evaluations, and progress monitoring, ensuring alignment with project scope, facility standards, and timeline requirements.

Required Qualifications & Experience:

Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Engineering or a related field.
6-8 years of experience in automation, instrumentation, and process controls, ideally within the petrochemical, refining, or oil & gas industries.
Proven expertise with Emerson DeltaV DCS, SIS systems, and Rockwell PLC hardware and software is required. Wonderware experience is preferred. 
Knowledge of ISA 88, ISA 95, IEC61511 standards, and industry codes.
Proficiency in terminal operations processes and project management principles.
Excellent communication skills with the ability to convey complex technical plans to both technical and non-technical audiences.
Willingness to travel up to 20%.

Nice to Have Skills & Experience:

Advanced degree in a technical or business-related field.
Familiarity with major Tank Gauging Systems and industry standards.
Knowledge of OT cybersecurity and IT/OT convergence principles.

Perks & Benefits:

Competitive salary commensurate with experience.
Comprehensive benefits package including health, dental, and vision insurance.
Bonus structure up to 25% annually! 

Other Information:

Applicants must be eligible to work in the United States. Our client is unable to provide sponsorship at this time.

If you are interested in learning more about the Industrial Automation Engineer opportunity, please submit your resume for consideration. Our client is unable to provide sponsorship at this time.

We are Inceed, a staffing direct placement firm who believes in the possibility of something better. Our mission is simple: We‚Äôre here to help every person, whether client, candidate, or employee, find and secure what‚Äôs better for them.

Inceed is an equal opportunity employer. Inceed prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type and affords equal employment opportunities to employees and applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, or expression, pregnancy, age, national origin, disability status, genetic information, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

body.title:
Director, Global Plant Automation
Director, Global Plant Automation with verification
body.description:
About the job
Position:  Director, Global Plant Automation 

At Nexteer, our strength lies in the diversity of our team‚Äîeach member contributing unique backgrounds, experiences, and aspirations. We believe this diversity fuels our innovation, broadens our perspectives, and propels our collective growth.

For over a century, we‚Äôve been innovators in the automotive industry. Our vision is clear - we are a global leading motion control technology company accelerating mobility to be safe, green and exciting. Our unwavering commitment to Quality, Collaboration, Integrity, and Accountability guides us as we solve motion control challenges for over 60 global customers. If you‚Äôre ready to join a dynamic team that drives change and makes a difference, Nexteer welcomes you!

About The Role

The Director of Automation at Nexteer will spearhead the development and implementation of comprehensive automation strategies across all plants. This role encompasses high-level simulation of full-plant operations, integration of PC&L material movement with manufacturing processes, and the creation of automated systems for monitoring and reporting critical feedback. The Director will guide the team on latest technology advancements, drive local plant implementation planning, establish global strategies for PC&L automation, Create strategy for plant digitalization, and ERP integration. Collaboration with leadership from divisions, Global functional areas, and external consultants is essential. This role will ensure alignment with corporate strategies while driving significant automation advancements by 2027.

Key Responsibilities

As a Director, Global Plant Automation, you will be responsible to:

 Create global strategy for automation of a full plant with use of technology reducing labor costs and increasing efficiency (OEE) 
 Develop local plans by plant maximizing cost reduction and efficiency improvements against CAPEX spend 
 Integrate global capacity utilization forecasting process into overall automation strategy 
 Support actions to reduce capital and manufactured costs of future business pursuits for all product lines 
 Develop global strategy with GSM for CAPEX items to support new level of automation within CAPEX budgets 
 Create strategy for automation of PC&L which fits within larger PC&L global goals and strategies 
 Create strategy to balance reduced indirect labor and component costs (MRTS) with GSM and PC&L teams 
 Integrate global automation strategy into Operations NPS strategy and KPIs 
 Communicate with GOC, and stakeholders, and suppliers the roadmap to Nexteer future of automated plants 
 Gather outside benchmark information around automation inside manufacturing environments 
 Stay abreast of developments in areas of Vision, Robotics, Software defined plants, Ai, ERPs, and big data 
 Manage global group workload, administer annual PFT‚Äôs both direct and matrix 
 Develop employees (training, mentor, coach) to help them reach personal goals 
 Create a BLUE/ Humanistic-Encouraging culture within the global team 


Qualifications

 10+ years of relevant experience 
 Demonstrated director level leadership with strong results is required 
 Proven record of creating strategy, with execution thru cross discipline team is required 
 Proven record of indirect influence thru matrix and non-reporting teams is required 
 Understanding of lean manufacturing principals and KPIs is required 
 Knowledge of Nexteer global manufacturing plant environments preferred 
 Prior leadership of plant level operations preferred 
 Prior leadership in automation strategies preferred 
 Understanding of modeling and simulation used to direct actions and set KPIs preferred 
 Understanding of business case analysis and plant level financials preferred 
 Nexteer product line (CEPS, PEPS, REPS, SbW, CIS, DL) knowledge preferred 
 Prior Machine and Equipment specifying and qualifying preferred 
 Must have proven record of managing multiple projects simultaneously 
 Must have a proven record of developing people, teams, and strategies 
 Must have ability to recognize people for good performance 
 Exhibits a strong sense of urgency and has a proven record of making timely decisions 
 Good oral and written communication skills 
 High level of analytical skills with large data aggregation 
 Global travel required (Quarterly) 


Education Requirements

 DEGREE: BACHELOR, REQUIRED MAJOR: Engineering, PC&L, Mfg. Operations 
 DEGREE: MASTERS, PREFERRED MAJOR: Business Administrations 


 Nexteer is an Equal Opportunity Employer  Disabled/Minorities/Veterans/Women

VEVRAA Federal Contractor

Nexteer is an E-Verify employer. E-Verify is an internet-based system operated by the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) in partnership with the Social Security Administration (SSA) that allows participating employees to electronically verify the employment eligibility of their newly hired employees in the United States.

 Accessibility for Applicants with Disabilities:  If you need a reasonable accommodation for the online application process due to a disability, please call 1-989-757-5000. Please provide your contact information and details about the posted position of interest. Only inquiries regarding assistance for those who need an accommodation with the online application process due to a disability will be returned.

About Nexteer

Nexteer Automotive is a global leading motion control technology company accelerating mobility to be safe, green and exciting. Our innovative product and technology portfolio includes electric and hydraulic power steering systems, steer-by-wire systems, steering columns and intermediate shafts, driveline systems and software solutions. The company solves motion control challenges across all megatrends ‚Äì including electrification, software/connectivity, ADAS/automated driving and shared mobility ‚Äì for more than 60 customers around the world including BMW, Ford, GM, RNM, Stellantis, Toyota and VW, as well as automakers in India and China including BYD, Chery, Great Wall, Geely, Xpeng and others. Learn more at:

 Employment Agencies 

Employment agencies are an important component of our talent acquisition strategy, and we value the partnerships we have built with our preferred vendors. We will not accept unsolicited resumes from employment agencies for any employment opportunity. All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at Nexteer Automotive or directly to hiring managers in any form without a signed Nexteer Automotive Agency Agreement on file, and search engagement for that position, will be deemed unsolicited in nature, and no fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired as a result of the referral or through other means. Additionally, any resume submitted without a contract in place will be considered Nexteer Automotive property and no fees will be paid to the agency if the candidate is hired.

Please note, agency agreements will only be valid if in writing and signed by a member of Nexteer‚Äôs Human Resources team. No other Nexteer employee is authorized to bind Nexteer to any agreement regarding the placement of candidates by an agency.

body.description:
About the job
Description

The Opportunity: 

JR Automation, a Hitachi Group Company, is driven to deliver customer success worldwide. We provide intelligent automated manufacturing and distribution technology solutions that transform how the world's leading manufacturers make and distribute products. Our strength is our people and we‚Äôre always looking to get stronger across North America, Europe, and Asia.

Join us as an Application Engineer in Auburn Hills, MI as we work together to bring innovative automation solutions to life.

Location Type: This is a hybrid role requiring two to three days onsite located at our office in Auburn Hills, MI.

Applications Engineering within the custom automation equipment industry is focused on the development of competitive technical solutions to customer requirements for custom automated equipment.

How You‚Äôll Make An Impact

Review customer technical specifications and requirements in preparation for the development of System Concepts, Costs, Risk Assessments, and Proposal Documents that define the content and functionality of the proposed Scope of Work.
Apply Practical Conformance to the JRA Corporate Practices, Procedures and Tools, specifically those developed for the use and function of the Applications Engineering Department.
Coordinating and executing large multi-business unit quotes.
Managing core customers.
Developing internal win strategy and execution, understanding customer pain points, and facilitating quote package development towards a winning quote package.
Generating and rendering conceptual solutions for customer problems which may have no previous or standard solutions in various CAD formats.
Facilitating concept brainstorming, leading docket review meetings with little need of support higher level AE‚Äôs.
Coordinating and scheduling both preliminary and final reviews of Audience Quote Packages, including internal and external assessments. These reviews cover Concept Solutions, Cycle Time Charts, Flow Charts, Risk Assessments, System Costs, proposed Delivery Schedules, and potential Customer Requirements that require management attention.
Reviews shall be conducted with little need of support from higher level AE‚Äôs.
Developing Proposals that clearly and completely defined the proposed Scope of Work, the Rate of Production, outlines the Machine Buy-off requirements, identifies Customer Part requirements thru all Project Phases, and includes appropriate Assumptions and Exceptions to the proposed Scope of Work.
Aiding in the mentorship of less experienced Apps Engineers, Co-ops and Interns.
Supporting Account Managers by ensuring pain points and competitive advantages are leveraged into the Proposals.
Traveling independently or with an Account Manager.
Independently presenting in meetings to internal functional team members, upper level management and to customers.
Maintaining assignment-specific AE related fields in company CRM.
Schedule and facilitate Project Kickoff Meetings for PEP.
Supporting functional team members associated with a project by facilitating required Tollgate Meetings for awarded work and consulting with the PM for scope variation.
Attend early Phase Project Design Reviews to ensure conformance to ‚ÄúAs Sold‚Äù Scope of Work.

What You‚Äôll Bring

5+ years of industry experience leading successful projects.
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in a related engineering field or related industry experience. 
Mechanical or Mechatronics engineer strongly preferred.
Proficient in all Applications Engineering processes and tools.
Background in Body in White applications and quoting is preferred.
Experience in sales and/or customer interaction.

Disclaimer: JR Automation requires candidates to successfully complete a 10-panel drug screen, physical examination, and background check.

Company Overview

At JR Automation, A Hitachi Group Company, we discover potential, reimagine limits, and advance industry. When faced with a problem, we find a solution. Together, we push what‚Äôs possible to automate for tomorrow.

Join our team of 2,000+ at one of our 20+ facilities around the world and be a part of the most experienced team of advanced automation integrators.

Fueled by Possible.

The company‚Äôs leadership team is a blend of top-tier AI technologists from organizations like Meta, Google, Microsoft, Apple, Amazon, and Twitter, alongside seasoned consultants from prestigious firms such as Accenture, Cognizant, Capgemini, McKinsey, and Bain, as well as alumni from renowned institutions like Stanford, Caltech, and MIT.

Required Skills

Technical Expertise: 4-8 years of strong experience in Python, with a proven ability to write clean, efficient code and optimize quality through comprehensive code reviews.
Code Review & Quality Control: Expertise in conducting code reviews to enhance performance and maintain high standards of data quality, with a focus on quality assurance practices.
Tool Customisation & Automation: Hands-on experience in customizing annotation tools and automating tasks to increase operational efficiency.
Leadership & Mentorship: Demonstrated ability to lead small teams of at least 3-5 developers, guide them through technical challenges, and mentor junior members to support their professional growth.
Conflict Resolution & Resource Management: Strong skills in resolving conflicts and managing resources to ensure timely delivery of high-quality outcomes.
Communication & Stakeholder Engagement: Adept at explaining complex technical issues to diverse audiences, delivering constructive feedback, and providing clear updates to stakeholders.
Cross-Functional Collaboration: Experience in collaborating with cross-functional teams, particularly in driving process improvements alongside engineering teams.


Experience required:

IC3: 4-6 years of experience
IC4: 6-8 years of experience


What does day-to-day life look like?

Code Review & Quality Assurance: Conduct thorough reviews of LLM code, provide feedback, and ensure adherence to quality standards.
Tool Optimisation: Implement customizations and automation to improve team workflows and efficiency.
Team Leadership: Lead a small team, providing technical guidance and setting clear expectations for project success.
Collaboration: Coordinate with engineering and other teams to ensure technical requirements for data are met.
Process Improvement: Continuously assess and enhance team processes and workflows to drive productivity.
Stakeholder Interaction: Regularly communicate project updates and address any technical requirements from stakeholders.

Clear the given AI Interview (30 min) and Click on 'Apply' to get shortlisted

body.title:
Project Engineer - Building Automation Systems (BAS)
Project Engineer - Building Automation Systems (BAS)
body.description:
About the job
Job Details

Level

Experienced

Job Location

Sunrise, FL

Job Posting Date(s)

Start Date

01/16/2025

End Date

02/02/2025

Description

 Position Summary: 

We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Project Engineer to join our Miami team. As a Project Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining cutting-edge automation systems for commercial buildings. Your role will involve integrating various building systems, such as HVAC, lighting, security, and energy management, to create efficient and intelligent automated environments. You will work closely with our field operation team to ensure optimal functionality and user satisfaction.

 Reports to:  AutomationEngineering Manager

 Location of work:  Office 80%, Project site 20%

 Hours of operation:  8 am ‚Äì 5 pm M-F, May vary

Qualifications

 Desired Skills and Experience: 

 Bachelor's degree in electrical engineering, mechanical engineering, or a related field. Relevant certifications or an equivalent combination of education and experience will also be considered. 
 Proven experience in designing, implementing, and maintaining building automation systems or similar control systems. Experience with tools such as ACAD, Niagara, Distech, or other relevant automation software is a plus. 
 Strong knowledge of building systems, including HVAC, lighting, security, and energy management. 
 Experience with protocols used in building automation systems such as BACnet, Modbus, or LonWorks, or other related communication protocols in automation and control systems. 
 Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills, with the ability to identify and resolve complex technical issues. 
 Strong communication and interpersonal skills to effectively collaborate with multidisciplinary teams and interact with clients. 
 Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks, and manage multiple projects simultaneously. 
 Knowledge of applicable building codes, regulations, and energy efficiency standards. 
 Flexibility to travel to client sites for commissioning and maintenance as required. 


 Responsibilities: 

 Design and develop Building Automation Systems based on client requirements and industry best practices. 
 Integrate diverse building systems, including HVAC, lighting, security, access control, fire alarms, and energy management, into a unified automation platform. 
 Collaborate with project managers, engineers, and facility managers to understand building specifications, technical constraints, and user needs. 
 Create detailed system design documents, including system architecture, wiring diagrams, and control sequences. 
 Collaborate with vendors as needed to verify the proper use, functionality, and limitations of sourced components. 
 Create programs for automation controllers, sensors, actuators, and other devices to achieve desired functionality and performance. 
 Provide Graphics Engineer with detailed system schematics, Graphics hardware, and software point list based on the design documents, wiring diagrams, and control programs. 
 Create performance checkout documentation for the field operation team. 
 Conduct final on-site commissioning (Big Picture) of automation systems to ensure proper functioning and adherence to project specifications. 
 Provide technical support and training to the field operation team. 
 Provide technical support and training to end-users, including facility managers and maintenance staff. 
 Adhere to the Project schedule and deadline provided by the Project manager and customer. 
 Stay updated on industry trends, emerging technologies, and regulations related to building automation systems. 
 Ensure compliance with applicable codes, standards, and safety regulations. 
 Assist the BAS Service Team with regular system maintenance, such as upgrades, and software/firmware updates to optimize performance and address any issues. 
 Assist in developing project proposals, cost estimates, and timelines for automation projects. 


 Why Work at Brooks Building Solutions? 

Founded in 1984, Brooks Building Solutions is a leader in providing mechanical and electrical services, building automation, HVAC equipment, and energy-efficient solutions to the commercial building sector. With over 110 associates, we are committed to optimizing energy efficiency and creating healthy indoor environments for our clients, which include office buildings, healthcare facilities, K-12 and higher education institutions, government buildings, and industrial spaces. Our solutions help clients reduce energy consumption and lower their operating costs, all while meeting sustainability goals.

We are proud to be recognized as a Metro Jacksonville Top Workplace of 2024 and 2025, a testament to our strong company culture and commitment to employee satisfaction. As a growing company, we offer significant opportunities for career advancement and promotion, allowing you to grow alongside the business. We invest in our team‚Äôs success through comprehensive training and mentorship programs, with direct access to senior leadership, providing you the chance to share ideas and contribute to the company‚Äôs growth‚Äîan opportunity you often don‚Äôt get at larger companies.

In addition to fostering a supportive and dynamic work environment, we offer a robust benefits package that includes PTO, healthcare benefits, paid holidays, contributions to your HSA account, and a 401k match to help secure your future. We value work-life balance, offering the day after Thanksgiving off and a half-day on Christmas Eve to help you unwind and spend time with loved ones.

Join us at Brooks Building Solutions and be part of a company where your growth, ideas, and contributions are valued!

Brooks Building Solutions is an equal opportunity employer. Employment decisions are based on merit, performance, and business needs. We do not discriminate based on any status protected by law .

Automation Procurement Specialist with verification
body.description:
About the job
Job Title: Automation Procurement Specialist / Buyer
Location: Visp, Switzerland
Duration: 1-year contract with possibility of extension.

We are seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Automation Category Specialist / Buyer to join our dynamic procurement team in the pharmaceutical or biotech sector. This role involves supporting category management, driving automation initiatives, and ensuring efficient purchasing operations.

Key Responsibilities:
Develop and deploy category strategies.
Manage demand, supply, and capacity with key suppliers and stakeholders.
Conduct supplier relationship management and market monitoring.
Lead procurement of hardware, software, and licensing models.
Execute strategic and operational procurement tasks.
Participate in projects to improve technical purchasing efficiency.
Support category-specific benchmarks and cost breakdowns.

Qualifications:
Technical or Commercial training (Process Engineering, Chemical Engineering, Business Management, Project Management, Supply Chain, Electrical or Computer Engineering).
Relevant certifications (e.g., CIPS, Six Sigma) are a plus.
Several years of experience in procurement, buying, or supply chain management (pharmaceutical or biotech sector preferred).
Familiarity with procurement automation tools.
Excellent English proficiency.
Strong analytical, organizational, and communication skills.
Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite and procurement software (e.g., SAP, Ariba, Oracle).

Working Conditions:
Hybrid work environment with 3 days a week at Visp site and occasional travel to supplier sites.

If you have at least 6 years of experience in Procurement/CAPEX within the pharma industry with both direct and indirect procurement, apply to be part of a growing team in a leading pharmaceutical/biotech industry, and develop a strong foundation in category management, procurement, and automation, with real opportunities for career advancement and professional development.

Apply at the job post or directly with your CV at: ptoma@astoncarter.com

body.title:
Oracle HCM Automation Lead (Remote)
Oracle HCM Automation Lead (Remote) with verification
body.description:
About the job
Cognizant Technology Solutions is looking for a ‚ÄúOracle HCM Automation Lead (Remote)‚Äù to join in our team of IT professionals in a permanent role. If you meet our background requirements and skills and are looking for an opportunity with these skills and expertise, here is the ideal opportunity for you!

About Cognizant‚Äôs QEA Practice

We are the largest Quality Assurance Practice Globally servicing 800+ Clients. We bring the industry leading vision and expertise to help with Quality Engineering transformation journey for our reputed clients. We provide Next Gen QA offerings like System Modernization assurance, Business Process Assurance, Quality Engineering, Cloud Platform Assurance, Customer Experience Assurance and Robotic Test Automation. We have been ranked #1 for Market Impact by Everest Group for four times in a row and ranked #1 for completeness of vision, test advisory and Digital Business Assurance in Gartner Magic Quadrant!

Oracle HCM Automation Lead (Remote) 

Location: Pleasanton, CA ‚Äì Remote allowed (Travel to client location on need basis)

Required Skills

Bachelor‚Äôs degree in computer science or equivalent related work experience.

Mandatory

8+ years of experience in Automation Tools: Selenium, Python, Maven, Cucumber, Git, Rest, JDBC

Frameworks: Expertise in Hybrid, Data-Driven, and Keyword-Driven frameworks.

Testing Techniques: Experience in functional, regression, and Automation testing.

Integration Testing: Proficiency in validating file transfers.

Platforms - Oracle HCM, OIC Integrations (both, at least exposure)

Good To Have

CI/CD Pipelines: Integration with Jenkins, Git, or Azure DevOps for test automation execution.

Database Knowledge: SQL queries for data setup and validation.

Integration Testing: Proficiency in validating inbound and outbound data flows, API testing, and SFTP-based file transfers.

Platforms: Oracle OIC Connections, Lookups, Embedded SFTP | VBCS - Build dashboard, UI,BO's.

Automation Tools: Selenium ‚Äì Java, Jenkins, TestNG, SOAP

Roles And Responsibilities

Design and implement scalable Hybrid, Data-Driven, and Keyword-Driven automation frameworks using Selenium and Python.

Maintain and enhance existing frameworks for optimized performance.

Develop reusable libraries, scripts, and utilities to enhance automation testing efficiency.

Automate integrations for inbound and outbound data transfers, ensuring seamless communication with third-party systems.

Validate data integrity using SFTP, file transfers, and API testing methodologies.

Prepare detailed test strategies, test plans, and test scripts aligned with business requirements.

Perform system integration testing (SIT), regression testing, and user acceptance testing (UAT).

Implement automated test scripts across environments and monitor results using CI/CD pipelines.

Excellent communication, presentation, and client-facing skills.

Ability to define test strategies, lead teams, and manage project delivery

Work closely with functional consultants, developers, and business partners to understand and validate requirements.

Provide regular status updates, highlight risks, and propose mitigation strategies.

Lead the automation team, provide mentorship, and ensure the delivery of high-quality results.

Generate test metrics and dashboards to measure test coverage and automation effectiveness.

Expertise in data validation techniques, including reconciliation of large data sets.

Salary And Other Compensation

Applications will be accepted until 01/23/2025.

The annual salary for this position is between $[110,000 ‚Äì $130,000] depending on experience and other qualifications of the successful candidate.

This position is also eligible for Cognizant‚Äôs discretionary annual incentive program, based on performance and subject to the terms of Cognizant‚Äôs applicable plans.

Work Authorization

Cognizant will only consider applicants for this position who are legally authorized to work in the United States without company sponsorship (H-1B, L-1B, L-1A, etc.)

Benefits

Cognizant offers the following benefits for this position, subject to applicable eligibility requirements:

Medical/Dental/Vision/Life Insurance

Paid holidays plus Paid Time Off

401(k) plan and contributions

Long-term/Short-term Disability

Paid Parental Leave

Employee Stock Purchase Plan

Disclaimer: The salary, other compensation, and benefits information is accurate as of the date of this posting. Cognizant reserves the right to modify this information at any time, subject to applicable law.

body.title:
Automation Security Engineer - Active DoD Secret Clearance
Automation Security Engineer - Active DoD Secret Clearance
body.description:
About the job
Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, Prism, Inc., is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!

This hybrid remote position requires one to be onsite 1 day a week in Colorado Springs, CO.

Must be local or within a 1-hour commute.

Due to Federal Governement Security Clearance Requirements: U.S. Citizenship and Active DoD Secret Clearance

PRISM seeks a highly skilled and motivated Automation Security Engineer to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining our organization's security infrastructure. You will play a critical role in safeguarding our systems and data by automating security assessments, developing and implementing security controls, and supporting DevSecOps initiatives.

Responsibilities:

Security Infrastructure Management: Design, implement, and maintain the organization's security infrastructure, including firewalls, intrusion detection/prevention systems (IDS/IPS), data loss prevention (DLP), and security information and event management (SIEM) systems.
Security Assessments & Testing: Conducted and automated security assessments and penetration testing to identify vulnerabilities and develop mitigation strategies.
Security Policies & Standards: Develop and maintain security policies, procedures, and standards in compliance with industry best practices and regulatory requirements.
Vulnerability Management: Develop and track Plan of Action and Milestones (POA&Ms) to address identified security vulnerabilities and compliance gaps.
DevSecOps Integration: Support DevSecOps initiatives by developing and implementing test-driven security within a CI/CD pipeline.
Authorization to Operate (ATO) Support: Work and support Authorization to Operate (ATO, cATOs) processes.
Threat Intelligence: Conduct research on emerging threats, vulnerabilities, and technologies to stay updated on the evolving security landscape.
Incident Response: Participate in incident response activities, including forensic analysis, evidence gathering, and reporting.

Requirements:

Active DOD Secret Clearance
At least 7 years of experience as a Security Automation Engineer/Tester or related field.
Experience with some or all of the following:
Chef Automate
Appscan
IBM Security Products (e.g., QRadar, Guardium)
Nexus
Splunk
Vault (Vault Enterprise, Venafi)
Selenium
Strong understanding of security principles and best practices.
Experience with scripting languages (e.g., Python, Bash, PowerShell).
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team. 

Preferred Qualifications:

Relevant security certifications (e.g., CISSP, CISA, CEH).
Experience with cloud security (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform).
Knowledge of container security technologies.
Experience with orchestration tools (e.g., Ansible, Kubernetes)

Mechanical Design Engineer with c3 years+ experience of using SolidWorks for automated special purpose machinery design required to work on bespoke projects for an established client in the South East.
 Mechanical Design Engineer 
¬£35,000 - ¬£45,000 + 24 days holiday, 8% pension
East Sussex

Responsible for the mechanical aspects of design

Performing and documenting design calculations

 Mechanical Design Engineer - The Person:
Proven knowledge of design principles, standards, and regulations
Self-motivated
Imaginative, problem solver
Experience in designing automated special purpose machinery with Solidworks
 You will join a focused engineering team within a business who offer flexible & hybrid working as standard. Offering an 8% pension, all Engineers are supported to continue further professional training. An employee focused business with a genuine open door policy.
 This role would suit driven Engineers keen to work on bespoke projects for varying sectors.
 Located in East Sussex, this role would be commutable from within and around Tunbridge Wells, Eastbourne, Brighton, East Grinstead, Heathfield and Hastings.
  For further information call Sarah Clarke
Available on: 01902212000 or 07519122547
Or email: Sarah.Clarke@Automationexperts.co.uk

Since its founding in 2018, the company has achieved remarkable growth, boasting a Talent Cloud of over three million developers worldwide and serving 900+ clients. Its innovative approach and impactful contributions have earned it numerous accolades, including being named one of "America's Best Startup Employers" by Forbes in 2022, securing the top spot in The Information's 2021 Annual List of most promising B2B companies, and being featured in Fast Company's "World's Most Innovative Companies" list.

The company‚Äôs leadership team is a blend of top-tier AI technologists from organizations like Meta, Google, Microsoft, Apple, Amazon, and Twitter, alongside seasoned consultants from prestigious firms such as Accenture, Cognizant, Capgemini, McKinsey, and Bain, as well as alumni from renowned institutions like Stanford, Caltech, and MIT.

Required Skills

Technical Expertise: 4-8 years of strong experience in Python, with a proven ability to write clean, efficient code and optimize quality through comprehensive code reviews.
Code Review & Quality Control: Expertise in conducting code reviews to enhance performance and maintain high standards of data quality, with a focus on quality assurance practices.
Tool Customisation & Automation: Hands-on experience in customizing annotation tools and automating tasks to increase operational efficiency.
Leadership & Mentorship: Demonstrated ability to lead small teams of at least 3-5 developers, guide them through technical challenges, and mentor junior members to support their professional growth.
Conflict Resolution & Resource Management: Strong skills in resolving conflicts and managing resources to ensure timely delivery of high-quality outcomes.
Communication & Stakeholder Engagement: Adept at explaining complex technical issues to diverse audiences, delivering constructive feedback, and providing clear updates to stakeholders.
Cross-Functional Collaboration: Experience in collaborating with cross-functional teams, particularly in driving process improvements alongside engineering teams.


Experience required:

IC3: 4-6 years of experience
IC4: 6-8 years of experience


What does day-to-day life look like?

Code Review & Quality Assurance: Conduct thorough reviews of LLM code, provide feedback, and ensure adherence to quality standards.
Tool Optimisation: Implement customizations and automation to improve team workflows and efficiency.
Team Leadership: Lead a small team, providing technical guidance and setting clear expectations for project success.
Collaboration: Coordinate with engineering and other teams to ensure technical requirements for data are met.
Process Improvement: Continuously assess and enhance team processes and workflows to drive productivity.
Stakeholder Interaction: Regularly communicate project updates and address any technical requirements from stakeholders.

Job Location: Chennai, Bangalore, Hyderabad, Coimbatore, Kolkata, Pune, Cochin, Noida
Shift Timing: 12 PM to 10 PM IST

For example, they can log in at 12 PM IST and leave the office early (after six to seven hours in office) and then work from home the remaining hours.

:Overall 4 ‚Äì 10 years and minimum 2+ years of relevant experience in Java selenium is must

body.title:
Head of AI
Head of AI
body.description:
About the job
Experience: 10.00 + years

Salary: INR 5000000.00 / year (based on experience)

Expected Notice Period: 15 Days

Shift: (GMT+05:30) Asia/Kolkata (IST)

Opportunity Type: Remote

Placement Type: Full Time Permanent position(Payroll and Compliance to be managed by: RemoFirst)

(*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' client - Pet Health and Wellness Company)

What do you need for this opportunity?

Must have skills required:

Analytical Skills, automation, Ecommerce, GenAI, LangChain, Notion, Team management, Agile, Project management

Pet Health and Wellness Company is Looking for: 

About: 

We are a pet health and wellness company committed to providing innovative solutions for dogs. Our flagship product is an all-in-one powder supplement designed to support various aspects of canine health, including oral, joint, digestive, skin, and coat health. We are driven by a deep passion for pets and a mission to enhance their lives through high-quality, scientifically backed products.

Position Overview:

We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Head of AI to lead our AI initiatives, with a particular focus on project management and execution. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in AI, particularly within the e-commerce and Shopify domains. You will play a crucial role in shaping the future of our AI-powered platform and ensuring its alignment with our company''s vision and goals.

Key Responsibilities

 Oversee and manage the team, ensuring the smooth execution of projects and workflows.
 Develop and implement automation workflows, leveraging tools like LangChain, GenAI, and other AI frameworks.
 Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product, design, development, and marketing, to integrate AI features into our SaaS products.
 Design and execute AI solutions for the pet health and wellness industry, leveraging your understanding of the market and our target audience.
 Utilize tools such as Notion and Slack for efficient team communication and project tracking.
 Ensure projects adhere to Agile methodologies and are delivered on time with precision.
 Proactively identify opportunities for innovation and improvement in AI applications within the pet health and wellness sector.
 Showcase strong project management skills to manage stakeholders and cross-functional teams, ensuring alignment and efficient collaboration.


Qualifications

 A total of 10+ years of experience, includingt least 5 years in project management, with a proven track record of successfully leading and delivering e-commerce and Shopify projects.
 A minimum of 2 years in AI, specifically GenAI and related tools, demonstrating hands-on expertise in AI technologies.
 Prior experience working with US-based clients in the e-commerce industry, demonstrating a strong understanding of US work culture and client expectations.


Skills: 

 Proficiency in LangChain and automation workflows, showcasing the ability to develop and implement efficient AI solutions.
 Deep understanding of AI tools and technologies, with hands-on expertise in GenAI and other relevant frameworks.
 Strong project management and leadership skills, with the ability to manage stakeholders, cross-functional teams, and project timelines effectively.
 Excellent attention to detail and ability to interpret and execute complex tasks with minimal guidance.

Register or login on our portal & fill out the application form.
Clear the given AI Interview (30 min) and Click on 'Apply' to get shortlisted
Once it's all done, your profile will be shared with the client for the Interview round.
When selected, just meet the client and get your exciting career started!

About the job
Cognizant Technology Solutions is seeking a ‚ÄúSDET Lead : Web Automation(Hybrid)‚Äùto join our team of IT professionals in a permanent role. If you meet our background requirements and skills and are seeking an opportunity with these skills and expertise, here is the ideal opportunity for you !!

About Cognizant‚Äôs QEA Practice

We are the largest Quality Assurance Practice Globally servicing 800+ Clients. We bring the industry leading vision and expertise to help with Quality Engineering transformation journey for our reputed clients. We provide Next Gen QA offerings like System Modernization assurance, Business Process Assurance, Quality Engineering, Cloud Platform Assurance, Customer Experience Assurance and Robotic Test Automation. We have been ranked #1 for Market Impact by Everest Group for four times in a row and ranked #1 for completeness of vision, test advisory and Digital Business Assurance in Gartner Magic Quadrant !!

SDET Lead : Web Automation(Hybrid)

Onsite Location : Alpharetta, GA

Qualifications

Java SDET with 8 to 10 yrs of experience in the following :

WEB automation (Selenium) & API automation (Rest Assured, Cucumber BDD etc.)
building Automation framework from scratch.
proficiency in tools like SoapUI/Rest API etc.
in Agile methodology and Integrating automated tests in Continuous Integration and Delivery pipeline, DevOps
Validated understanding on UI automation with Java/Selenium/BDD; API Automation
Validated understanding of QA methodology and tools
Excellent analytical & Strong Debugging skills
Experience with Jira, Confluence
Experience with continuous integration tools (Ex: Jenkins) and ability to build, modify, implement & configure jobs
proven experience with GIT, Bitbucket, Maven
proven experience in Agile / Scrum
XRAY knowledge is a plus
Good to have prior working in the Financial Services Industry (Banking/retirement/investment/Trading/Payments)

Roles & Responsibilities

Creation and execution of complex, automated test scripts for testing business critical automation scripts using tools such as Java based Framework, Java, Selenium, Cucumber BDD, TestNG, Gradle and Jenkins.

contribute towards the Framework creation/customization based on the requirements
participate in Test planning and Estimation of projects using TCP Estimation Methodology.

Maintain all project requirements and execution details on Test Management Tool JIRA.

Review Test Cases, Performing root cause analysis (RCA) for the production defects.

Perform failure analysis for mobile automation, scripts analyze and identify test cases feasible for automation.
Share the Daily Status Report with project collaborators and providing Go/No-Go decisions for production releases.
attend Scrum Call, Backlog Grooming and Sprint Planning & Sprint Retrospective for all the deliverables.

Work Authorization

Cognizant will only consider applicants for this position who are legally authorized to work in the United States without company sponsorship (H-1B, L-1B, L-1A, etc.)

Benefits

Cognizant offers the following benefits for this position, subject to applicable eligibility requirements:

Medical/Dental/Vision/Life Insurance
Paid holidays plus Paid Time Off
401(k) plan and contributions
Long-term/Short-term Disability
Paid Parental Leave
Employee Stock Purchase Plan

body.title:
Tech Lead - Python
Tech Lead - Python
body.description:
About the job
Experience: 4.00 + years

Salary: Confidential (based on experience)

Expected Notice Period: 15 Days

Shift: (GMT+05:30) Asia/Kolkata (IST)

Opportunity Type: Remote

Placement Type: Full Time Indefinite Contract(40 hrs a week/160 hrs a month)

(*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' client - A world renowned tech talent company from USA)

What do you need for this opportunity?

Must have skills required:

NA, automation, Code Review, Quality Control, tool customisation, Leadership, Python, Quality Assurance

A world renowned tech talent company from USA is Looking for:

About The Company

Headquartered in Palo Alto, California, the company is the world's first AI-powered tech services organization. It has revolutionized the tech services industry by integrating AI into every aspect of its operations‚Äîoffering AI-vetted and matched talent, AI-driven development acceleration, and access to AI transformation experts who have played pivotal roles in building some of Silicon Valley's most iconic companies.

Since its founding in 2018, the company has achieved remarkable growth, boasting a Talent Cloud of over three million developers worldwide and serving 900+ clients. Its innovative approach and impactful contributions have earned it numerous accolades, including being named one of "America's Best Startup Employers" by Forbes in 2022, securing the top spot in The Information's 2021 Annual List of most promising B2B companies, and being featured in Fast Company's "World's Most Innovative Companies" list.

The company‚Äôs leadership team is a blend of top-tier AI technologists from organizations like Meta, Google, Microsoft, Apple, Amazon, and Twitter, alongside seasoned consultants from prestigious firms such as Accenture, Cognizant, Capgemini, McKinsey, and Bain, as well as alumni from renowned institutions like Stanford, Caltech, and MIT.

Required Skills

Technical Expertise: 4-8 years of strong experience in Python, with a proven ability to write clean, efficient code and optimize quality through comprehensive code reviews.
Code Review & Quality Control: Expertise in conducting code reviews to enhance performance and maintain high standards of data quality, with a focus on quality assurance practices.
Tool Customisation & Automation: Hands-on experience in customizing annotation tools and automating tasks to increase operational efficiency.
Leadership & Mentorship: Demonstrated ability to lead small teams of at least 3-5 developers, guide them through technical challenges, and mentor junior members to support their professional growth.
Conflict Resolution & Resource Management: Strong skills in resolving conflicts and managing resources to ensure timely delivery of high-quality outcomes.
Communication & Stakeholder Engagement: Adept at explaining complex technical issues to diverse audiences, delivering constructive feedback, and providing clear updates to stakeholders.
Cross-Functional Collaboration: Experience in collaborating with cross-functional teams, particularly in driving process improvements alongside engineering teams.


Experience required:

IC3: 4-6 years of experience
IC4: 6-8 years of experience


What does day-to-day life look like?

Code Review & Quality Assurance: Conduct thorough reviews of LLM code, provide feedback, and ensure adherence to quality standards.
Tool Optimisation: Implement customizations and automation to improve team workflows and efficiency.
Team Leadership: Lead a small team, providing technical guidance and setting clear expectations for project success.
Collaboration: Coordinate with engineering and other teams to ensure technical requirements for data are met.
Process Improvement: Continuously assess and enhance team processes and workflows to drive productivity.
Stakeholder Interaction: Regularly communicate project updates and address any technical requirements from stakeholders.


How to apply for this opportunity?

Register or login on our portal & fill out the application form.
Clear the given AI Interview (30 min) and Click on 'Apply' to get shortlisted
Once it's all done, your profile will be shared with the client for the Interview round.
When selected, just meet the client and get your exciting career started!


About Uplers:

Our goal is to make hiring reliable, simple, and fast. Our role will be to help all our talents find and apply for relevant contractual onsite opportunities and progress in their career. We will support any grievances or challenges you may face during the engagement. You will also be assigned to a dedicated Talent Success Coach during the engagement.

(Note: There are many more opportunities apart from this on the portal. Depending on the assessments you clear, you can apply for them as well).

So, if you are ready for a new challenge, a great work environment, and an opportunity to take your career to the next level, don't hesitate to apply today. We are waiting for you!

Desired Skills and Experience
NA, automation, Code Review, Quality Control, tool customisation, Leadership, Python, Quality Assurance

body.title:
Head of AI
Head of AI
body.description:
About the job
Experience: 10.00 + years

Salary: INR 5000000.00 / year (based on experience)

Expected Notice Period: 15 Days

Shift: (GMT+05:30) Asia/Kolkata (IST)

Opportunity Type: Remote

Placement Type: Full Time Permanent position(Payroll and Compliance to be managed by: RemoFirst)

(*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' client - Pet Health and Wellness Company)

What do you need for this opportunity?

Must have skills required:

Analytical Skills, automation, Ecommerce, GenAI, LangChain, Notion, Team management, Agile, Project management

Pet Health and Wellness Company is Looking for: 

About: 

We are a pet health and wellness company committed to providing innovative solutions for dogs. Our flagship product is an all-in-one powder supplement designed to support various aspects of canine health, including oral, joint, digestive, skin, and coat health. We are driven by a deep passion for pets and a mission to enhance their lives through high-quality, scientifically backed products.

Position Overview:

We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Head of AI to lead our AI initiatives, with a particular focus on project management and execution. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in AI, particularly within the e-commerce and Shopify domains. You will play a crucial role in shaping the future of our AI-powered platform and ensuring its alignment with our company''s vision and goals.

Key Responsibilities

 Oversee and manage the team, ensuring the smooth execution of projects and workflows.
 Develop and implement automation workflows, leveraging tools like LangChain, GenAI, and other AI frameworks.
 Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product, design, development, and marketing, to integrate AI features into our SaaS products.
 Design and execute AI solutions for the pet health and wellness industry, leveraging your understanding of the market and our target audience.
 Utilize tools such as Notion and Slack for efficient team communication and project tracking.
 Ensure projects adhere to Agile methodologies and are delivered on time with precision.
 Proactively identify opportunities for innovation and improvement in AI applications within the pet health and wellness sector.
 Showcase strong project management skills to manage stakeholders and cross-functional teams, ensuring alignment and efficient collaboration.


Qualifications

 A total of 10+ years of experience, includingt least 5 years in project management, with a proven track record of successfully leading and delivering e-commerce and Shopify projects.
 A minimum of 2 years in AI, specifically GenAI and related tools, demonstrating hands-on expertise in AI technologies.
 Prior experience working with US-based clients in the e-commerce industry, demonstrating a strong understanding of US work culture and client expectations.


Skills: 

 Proficiency in LangChain and automation workflows, showcasing the ability to develop and implement efficient AI solutions.
 Deep understanding of AI tools and technologies, with hands-on expertise in GenAI and other relevant frameworks.
 Strong project management and leadership skills, with the ability to manage stakeholders, cross-functional teams, and project timelines effectively.
 Excellent attention to detail and ability to interpret and execute complex tasks with minimal guidance.


How to apply for this opportunity?

Register or login on our portal & fill out the application form.
Clear the given AI Interview (30 min) and Click on 'Apply' to get shortlisted
Once it's all done, your profile will be shared with the client for the Interview round.
When selected, just meet the client and get your exciting career started!


About Uplers:

Our goal is to make hiring reliable, simple, and fast. Our role will be to help all our talents find and apply for relevant contractual onsite opportunities and progress in their career. We will support any grievances or challenges you may face during the engagement. You will also be assigned to a dedicated Talent Success Coach during the engagement.

(Note: There are many more opportunities apart from this on the portal. Depending on the assessments you clear, you can apply for them as well).

So, if you are ready for a new challenge, a great work environment, and an opportunity to take your career to the next level, don't hesitate to apply today. We are waiting for you!

Desired Skills and Experience
Analytical Skills, automation, Ecommerce, GenAI, LangChain, Notion, Team management, Agile, Project management

body.title:
Head of AI
Head of AI
body.description:
About the job
Experience: 10.00 + years

Salary: INR 5000000.00 / year (based on experience)

Expected Notice Period: 15 Days

Shift: (GMT+05:30) Asia/Kolkata (IST)

Opportunity Type: Remote

Placement Type: Full Time Permanent position(Payroll and Compliance to be managed by: RemoFirst)

(*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' client - Pet Health and Wellness Company)

What do you need for this opportunity?

Must have skills required:

Analytical Skills, automation, Ecommerce, GenAI, LangChain, Notion, Team management, Agile, Project management

Pet Health and Wellness Company is Looking for: 

About: 

We are a pet health and wellness company committed to providing innovative solutions for dogs. Our flagship product is an all-in-one powder supplement designed to support various aspects of canine health, including oral, joint, digestive, skin, and coat health. We are driven by a deep passion for pets and a mission to enhance their lives through high-quality, scientifically backed products.

Position Overview:

We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Head of AI to lead our AI initiatives, with a particular focus on project management and execution. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in AI, particularly within the e-commerce and Shopify domains. You will play a crucial role in shaping the future of our AI-powered platform and ensuring its alignment with our company''s vision and goals.

Key Responsibilities

 Oversee and manage the team, ensuring the smooth execution of projects and workflows.
 Develop and implement automation workflows, leveraging tools like LangChain, GenAI, and other AI frameworks.
 Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product, design, development, and marketing, to integrate AI features into our SaaS products.
 Design and execute AI solutions for the pet health and wellness industry, leveraging your understanding of the market and our target audience.
 Utilize tools such as Notion and Slack for efficient team communication and project tracking.
 Ensure projects adhere to Agile methodologies and are delivered on time with precision.
 Proactively identify opportunities for innovation and improvement in AI applications within the pet health and wellness sector.
 Showcase strong project management skills to manage stakeholders and cross-functional teams, ensuring alignment and efficient collaboration.


Qualifications

 A total of 10+ years of experience, includingt least 5 years in project management, with a proven track record of successfully leading and delivering e-commerce and Shopify projects.
 A minimum of 2 years in AI, specifically GenAI and related tools, demonstrating hands-on expertise in AI technologies.
 Prior experience working with US-based clients in the e-commerce industry, demonstrating a strong understanding of US work culture and client expectations.


Skills: 

 Proficiency in LangChain and automation workflows, showcasing the ability to develop and implement efficient AI solutions.
 Deep understanding of AI tools and technologies, with hands-on expertise in GenAI and other relevant frameworks.
 Strong project management and leadership skills, with the ability to manage stakeholders, cross-functional teams, and project timelines effectively.
 Excellent attention to detail and ability to interpret and execute complex tasks with minimal guidance.

Register or login on our portal & fill out the application form.
Clear the given AI Interview (30 min) and Click on 'Apply' to get shortlisted
Once it's all done, your profile will be shared with the client for the Interview round.

Our flagship product is an all-in-one powder supplement designed to support various aspects of canine health, including oral, joint, digestive, skin, and coat health. We are driven by a deep passion for pets and a mission to enhance their lives through high-quality, scientifically backed products.

Position Overview:

We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Head of AI to lead our AI initiatives, with a particular focus on project management and execution. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in AI, particularly within the e-commerce and Shopify domains. You will play a crucial role in shaping the future of our AI-powered platform and ensuring its alignment with our company''s vision and goals.

Key Responsibilities

 Oversee and manage the team, ensuring the smooth execution of projects and workflows.
 Develop and implement automation workflows, leveraging tools like LangChain, GenAI, and other AI frameworks.
 Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product, design, development, and marketing, to integrate AI features into our SaaS products.
 Design and execute AI solutions for the pet health and wellness industry, leveraging your understanding of the market and our target audience.
 Utilize tools such as Notion and Slack for efficient team communication and project tracking.
 Ensure projects adhere to Agile methodologies and are delivered on time with precision.
 Proactively identify opportunities for innovation and improvement in AI applications within the pet health and wellness sector.
 Showcase strong project management skills to manage stakeholders and cross-functional teams, ensuring alignment and efficient collaboration.


Qualifications

 A total of 10+ years of experience, includingt least 5 years in project management, with a proven track record of successfully leading and delivering e-commerce and Shopify projects.
 A minimum of 2 years in AI, specifically GenAI and related tools, demonstrating hands-on expertise in AI technologies.
 Prior experience working with US-based clients in the e-commerce industry, demonstrating a strong understanding of US work culture and client expectations.


Skills: 

 Proficiency in LangChain and automation workflows, showcasing the ability to develop and implement efficient AI solutions.

body.title:
Sr. SDET : Web Automation(Hybrid)
Sr. SDET : Web Automation(Hybrid) with verification
body.description:
About the job
Cognizant Technology Solutions is seeking a ‚Äú Sr. SDET : Web Automation(Hybrid)‚Äùto join our team of IT professionals in a permanent role. If you meet our background requirements and skills and are seeking an opportunity with these skills and expertise, here is the ideal opportunity for you !!

About Cognizant‚Äôs QEA Practice

We are the largest Quality Assurance Practice Globally servicing 800+ Clients. We bring the industry leading vision and expertise to help with Quality Engineering transformation journey for our reputed clients. We provide Next Gen QA offerings like System Modernization assurance, Business Process Assurance, Quality Engineering, Cloud Platform Assurance, Customer Experience Assurance and Robotic Test Automation. We have been ranked #1 for Market Impact by Everest Group for four times in a row and ranked #1 for completeness of vision, test advisory and Digital Business Assurance in Gartner Magic Quadrant !!

Sr. SDET : Web Automation(Hybrid)

Onsite Location : Alpharetta, GA

Qualifications

Java SDET with 6 to 8 yrs of experience in the following :

WEB automation (Selenium) & API automation (Rest Assured, Cucumber BDD etc.)
building Automation framework from scratch.
proficiency in tools like SoapUI/Rest API etc.
in Agile methodology and Integrating automated tests in Continuous Integration and Delivery pipeline, DevOps
Validated understanding on UI automation with Java/Selenium/BDD; API Automation
Validated understanding of QA methodology and tools
Excellent analytical & Strong Debugging skills
Experience with Jira, Confluence
Experience with continuous integration tools (Ex: Jenkins) and ability to build, modify, implement & configure jobs
proven experience with GIT, Bitbucket, Maven
proven experience in Agile / Scrum
XRAY knowledge is a plus
Good to have prior working in the Financial Services Industry (Banking/retirement/investment/Trading/Payments)

Roles & Responsibilities

Creation and execution of complex, automated test scripts for testing business critical automation scripts using tools such as Java based Framework, Java, Selenium, Cucumber BDD, TestNG, Gradle and Jenkins.

contribute towards the Framework creation/customization based on the requirements
participate in Test planning and Estimation of projects using TCP Estimation Methodology.

Maintain all project requirements and execution details on Test Management Tool JIRA.

Review Test Cases, Performing root cause analysis (RCA) for the production defects.

Perform failure analysis for mobile automation, scripts analyze and identify test cases feasible for automation.
Share the Daily Status Report with project collaborators and providing Go/No-Go decisions for production releases.
attend Scrum Call, Backlog Grooming and Sprint Planning & Sprint Retrospective for all the deliverables.

Work Authorization

Cognizant will only consider applicants for this position who are legally authorized to work in the United States without company sponsorship (H-1B, L-1B, L-1A, etc.)

Benefits

Cognizant offers the following benefits for this position, subject to applicable eligibility requirements:

Medical/Dental/Vision/Life Insurance
Paid holidays plus Paid Time Off
401(k) plan and contributions
Long-term/Short-term Disability
Paid Parental Leave
Employee Stock Purchase Plan

Tech Lead - Python
Tech Lead - Python
body.description:
About the job
Experience: 4.00 + years

Salary: Confidential (based on experience)

Expected Notice Period: 15 Days

Shift: (GMT+05:30) Asia/Kolkata (IST)

Opportunity Type: Remote

Placement Type: Full Time Indefinite Contract(40 hrs a week/160 hrs a month)

(*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' client - A world renowned tech talent company from USA)

What do you need for this opportunity?

Must have skills required:

NA, automation, Code Review, Quality Control, tool customisation, Leadership, Python, Quality Assurance

A world renowned tech talent company from USA is Looking for:

About The Company

Headquartered in Palo Alto, California, the company is the world's first AI-powered tech services organization. It has revolutionized the tech services industry by integrating AI into every aspect of its operations‚Äîoffering AI-vetted and matched talent, AI-driven development acceleration, and access to AI transformation experts who have played pivotal roles in building some of Silicon Valley's most iconic companies.

Since its founding in 2018, the company has achieved remarkable growth, boasting a Talent Cloud of over three million developers worldwide and serving 900+ clients. Its innovative approach and impactful contributions have earned it numerous accolades, including being named one of "America's Best Startup Employers" by Forbes in 2022, securing the top spot in The Information's 2021 Annual List of most promising B2B companies, and being featured in Fast Company's "World's Most Innovative Companies" list.

The company‚Äôs leadership team is a blend of top-tier AI technologists from organizations like Meta, Google, Microsoft, Apple, Amazon, and Twitter, alongside seasoned consultants from prestigious firms such as Accenture, Cognizant, Capgemini, McKinsey, and Bain, as well as alumni from renowned institutions like Stanford, Caltech, and MIT.

Required Skills

Technical Expertise: 4-8 years of strong experience in Python, with a proven ability to write clean, efficient code and optimize quality through comprehensive code reviews.
Code Review & Quality Control: Expertise in conducting code reviews to enhance performance and maintain high standards of data quality, with a focus on quality assurance practices.
Tool Customisation & Automation: Hands-on experience in customizing annotation tools and automating tasks to increase operational efficiency.
Leadership & Mentorship: Demonstrated ability to lead small teams of at least 3-5 developers, guide them through technical challenges, and mentor junior members to support their professional growth.
Conflict Resolution & Resource Management: Strong skills in resolving conflicts and managing resources to ensure timely delivery of high-quality outcomes.
Communication & Stakeholder Engagement: Adept at explaining complex technical issues to diverse audiences, delivering constructive feedback, and providing clear updates to stakeholders.
Cross-Functional Collaboration: Experience in collaborating with cross-functional teams, particularly in driving process improvements alongside engineering teams.


Experience required:

IC3: 4-6 years of experience
IC4: 6-8 years of experience


What does day-to-day life look like?

Code Review & Quality Assurance: Conduct thorough reviews of LLM code, provide feedback, and ensure adherence to quality standards.
Tool Optimisation: Implement customizations and automation to improve team workflows and efficiency.
Team Leadership: Lead a small team, providing technical guidance and setting clear expectations for project success.
Collaboration: Coordinate with engineering and other teams to ensure technical requirements for data are met.
Process Improvement: Continuously assess and enhance team processes and workflows to drive productivity.
Stakeholder Interaction: Regularly communicate project updates and address any technical requirements from stakeholders.


How to apply for this opportunity?

Register or login on our portal & fill out the application form.
Clear the given AI Interview (30 min) and Click on 'Apply' to get shortlisted
Once it's all done, your profile will be shared with the client for the Interview round.
When selected, just meet the client and get your exciting career started!

So, if you are ready for a new challenge, a great work environment, and an opportunity to take your career to the next level, don't hesitate to apply today. We are waiting for you!

NA, automation, Code Review, Quality Control, tool customisation, Leadership, Python, Quality Assurance

body.description:
About the job
Experience: 10.00 + years

Salary: INR 5000000.00 / year (based on experience)

Expected Notice Period: 15 Days

Shift: (GMT+05:30) Asia/Kolkata (IST)

Opportunity Type: Remote

Placement Type: Full Time Permanent position(Payroll and Compliance to be managed by: RemoFirst)

(*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' client - Pet Health and Wellness Company)

What do you need for this opportunity?

Must have skills required:

Analytical Skills, automation, Ecommerce, GenAI, LangChain, Notion, Team management, Agile, Project management

Pet Health and Wellness Company is Looking for: 

About: 

We are a pet health and wellness company committed to providing innovative solutions for dogs. Our flagship product is an all-in-one powder supplement designed to support various aspects of canine health, including oral, joint, digestive, skin, and coat health. We are driven by a deep passion for pets and a mission to enhance their lives through high-quality, scientifically backed products.

Position Overview:

We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Head of AI to lead our AI initiatives, with a particular focus on project management and execution. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in AI, particularly within the e-commerce and Shopify domains. You will play a crucial role in shaping the future of our AI-powered platform and ensuring its alignment with our company''s vision and goals.

Key Responsibilities

 Oversee and manage the team, ensuring the smooth execution of projects and workflows.
 Develop and implement automation workflows, leveraging tools like LangChain, GenAI, and other AI frameworks.
 Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product, design, development, and marketing, to integrate AI features into our SaaS products.
 Design and execute AI solutions for the pet health and wellness industry, leveraging your understanding of the market and our target audience.
 Utilize tools such as Notion and Slack for efficient team communication and project tracking.
 Ensure projects adhere to Agile methodologies and are delivered on time with precision.
 Proactively identify opportunities for innovation and improvement in AI applications within the pet health and wellness sector.
 Showcase strong project management skills to manage stakeholders and cross-functional teams, ensuring alignment and efficient collaboration.


Qualifications

 A total of 10+ years of experience, includingt least 5 years in project management, with a proven track record of successfully leading and delivering e-commerce and Shopify projects.
 A minimum of 2 years in AI, specifically GenAI and related tools, demonstrating hands-on expertise in AI technologies.
 Prior experience working with US-based clients in the e-commerce industry, demonstrating a strong understanding of US work culture and client expectations.


Skills: 

 Proficiency in LangChain and automation workflows, showcasing the ability to develop and implement efficient AI solutions.
 Deep understanding of AI tools and technologies, with hands-on expertise in GenAI and other relevant frameworks.
 Strong project management and leadership skills, with the ability to manage stakeholders, cross-functional teams, and project timelines effectively.
 Excellent attention to detail and ability to interpret and execute complex tasks with minimal guidance.

Register or login on our portal & fill out the application form.

body.description:
About the job
Experience: 4.00 + years

Salary: Confidential (based on experience)

Expected Notice Period: 15 Days

Shift: (GMT+05:30) Asia/Kolkata (IST)

Opportunity Type: Remote

Placement Type: Full Time Indefinite Contract(40 hrs a week/160 hrs a month)

(*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' client - A world renowned tech talent company from USA)

What do you need for this opportunity?

Must have skills required:

NA, automation, Code Review, Quality Control, tool customisation, Leadership, Python, Quality Assurance

A world renowned tech talent company from USA is Looking for:

About The Company

Headquartered in Palo Alto, California, the company is the world's first AI-powered tech services organization. It has revolutionized the tech services industry by integrating AI into every aspect of its operations‚Äîoffering AI-vetted and matched talent, AI-driven development acceleration, and access to AI transformation experts who have played pivotal roles in building some of Silicon Valley's most iconic companies.

Since its founding in 2018, the company has achieved remarkable growth, boasting a Talent Cloud of over three million developers worldwide and serving 900+ clients. Its innovative approach and impactful contributions have earned it numerous accolades, including being named one of "America's Best Startup Employers" by Forbes in 2022, securing the top spot in The Information's 2021 Annual List of most promising B2B companies, and being featured in Fast Company's "World's Most Innovative Companies" list.

The company‚Äôs leadership team is a blend of top-tier AI technologists from organizations like Meta, Google, Microsoft, Apple, Amazon, and Twitter, alongside seasoned consultants from prestigious firms such as Accenture, Cognizant, Capgemini, McKinsey, and Bain, as well as alumni from renowned institutions like Stanford, Caltech, and MIT.

Required Skills

Technical Expertise: 4-8 years of strong experience in Python, with a proven ability to write clean, efficient code and optimize quality through comprehensive code reviews.
Code Review & Quality Control: Expertise in conducting code reviews to enhance performance and maintain high standards of data quality, with a focus on quality assurance practices.
Tool Customisation & Automation: Hands-on experience in customizing annotation tools and automating tasks to increase operational efficiency.
Leadership & Mentorship: Demonstrated ability to lead small teams of at least 3-5 developers, guide them through technical challenges, and mentor junior members to support their professional growth.
Conflict Resolution & Resource Management: Strong skills in resolving conflicts and managing resources to ensure timely delivery of high-quality outcomes.
Communication & Stakeholder Engagement: Adept at explaining complex technical issues to diverse audiences, delivering constructive feedback, and providing clear updates to stakeholders.
Cross-Functional Collaboration: Experience in collaborating with cross-functional teams, particularly in driving process improvements alongside engineering teams.


Experience required:

IC3: 4-6 years of experience
IC4: 6-8 years of experience


What does day-to-day life look like?

Code Review & Quality Assurance: Conduct thorough reviews of LLM code, provide feedback, and ensure adherence to quality standards.
Tool Optimisation: Implement customizations and automation to improve team workflows and efficiency.
Team Leadership: Lead a small team, providing technical guidance and setting clear expectations for project success.
Collaboration: Coordinate with engineering and other teams to ensure technical requirements for data are met.
Process Improvement: Continuously assess and enhance team processes and workflows to drive productivity.
Stakeholder Interaction: Regularly communicate project updates and address any technical requirements from stakeholders.


How to apply for this opportunity?

Register or login on our portal & fill out the application form.
Clear the given AI Interview (30 min) and Click on 'Apply' to get shortlisted
Once it's all done, your profile will be shared with the client for the Interview round.
When selected, just meet the client and get your exciting career started!
