body.title:
Sr. SDET - Automation
Sr. SDET - Automation
body.description:
About the job
Our mission is to make meaningful learning a part of your everyday üß†. The shelf life of our skills is now less than 5 years. So, if you stopped learning today, your skills would soon be irrelevant. Think that‚Äôs a big problem? You‚Äôd be right.
Enter HowNow. Founded in 2019, our Learning and Skills Platform is disrupting the way people learn and upskill through technology. Whether it's finding a quick answer, learning skills or tapping into shared knowledge, we make it easy for people to learn what they need, when they need it. 
Already used by fast-growing scale-ups and global enterprises, such as Trainline, Depop and Sanofi, we‚Äôre pushing the boundaries of how people learn.
 Hi I'm Akhil Vutukuri the QA Team Lead at HowNow üëãüèæ I‚Äôm looking for a Sr. SDET to join us. 
At HowNow, you'll have the opportunity to implement all aspects of non-functional testing from scratch, giving you hands-on experience and the chance to shape our testing framework. This role offers excellent exposure to automation testing, allowing you to enhance your skills in a dynamic and innovative environment.
By joining HowNow, you'll be part of a team that values technical expertise and continuous improvement. If you're passionate about testing and looking for a place where you can make a real impact, HowNow is the ideal place for you.
Alongside the opportunities to develop and grow your career, we're a fun and friendly bunch. Have a watch of the video below to get an understanding of what it's like to work here. 


Day-to-day tasks will include üì©
You‚Äôll collaborate with Product Managers, Developers, and DevOps teams to understand requirements and ensure thorough testing coverage in an agile, fast-paced product environment.
You‚Äôll create automation frameworks from scratch and develop the entire architecture for UI and API testing.
You‚Äôll design, develop, and execute comprehensive automated test scripts using Playwright with TypeScript.
You‚Äôll automate API test scenarios using Axios/Frisby in combination with Playwright and TypeScript for comprehensive API test automation.
You‚Äôll automate complex scenarios to ensure robust and scalable test coverage for high-quality product delivery
You‚Äôll integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipelines and maintaining CI/CD processes to enable continuous delivery using Jenkins.
You‚Äôll manage and version test scripts using version control systems like GIT.
You‚Äôll write SQL queries for database testing to validate data integrity.
You‚Äôll analyze test results, identifying defects, generating reports, and driving timely resolutions to ensure seamless product functionality.
You‚Äôll perform performance testing using tools like JMeter and K6 to assess application scalability and stability.
You‚Äôll leverage Appium to automate mobile application testing (iOS and Android).
You‚Äôll mentor junior team members to write test scripts, manage automation frameworks, and adopt best practices in automation.

The key things that we will be looking for in applicants üîë
5‚Äì10 years of experience with automation tools, with a strong focus on Playwright and TypeScript.
Proven expertise in creating robust automation frameworks and automating complex test scenarios.
Strong experience in API test automation using Axios/Frisby with Playwright and TypeScript.
Strong experience in performance testing using tools like JMeter and K6.
Proficiency in mobile automation using Appium (iOS and Android).
Solid understanding of CI/CD platforms and processes to enable continuous testing in product pipelines using Jenkins.
Familiarity with version control systems like GIT.
Proven experience in manual testing with a strong understanding of QA processes.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to ensure product reliability.
Excellent communication and collaboration abilities to work effectively with cross-functional teams.
Ability to guide and train QA team members to improve their skills in automation and testing processes.

What you‚Äôll get:
üí∞ Our salaries are calculated using a SaaS benchmarking tool called (Figures). Happy to disclose upon application. You‚Äôll also receive a performance based bonus on top.
üè° Hybrid working (in our offices 3x a week Mon-Wed)
üíÜ Wind-down Fridays. No meetings from 3pm onwards on Fridays, for you to wind down for the weekend. Our HowNow‚Äôers use this time to exercise, study, or spend some time with their family and friends, which you can read about here
üëºüèº Enhanced maternity and paternity policies which you can read about here 
üå¥ 25 days holiday, plus bank holidays and your birthday day off
üìö An annual ¬£200 learning and development budget
üê∂ Dog friendly offices - we love our pets! üêæ
ü§© Monthly socials and team dinners which have included Bounce, Mystery Rooms, ITC Maratha, JW Marriot and many more
üí° Access to the very best learning platform out there (HowNow+) to keep you at the top of your game
 What's next? ü§î
Once you've applied, we'll get back in touch with you. This is usually within the next 5 working days. Sometimes it can take slightly longer, but we will get back to you regardless of what the outcome of your application is.
You'll be invited to a 30-minute video call with Naaz, our People Operations Coordinator to discuss your experiences and the role. 
 You'll be invited to a 45-minute video call with Akhil Vutukuri, our QA Team Lead to discuss your expertise on different tools and technologies used along with the processes followed.
You'll be invited to a 90-minutes video call with Akhil Vutukuri, our QA Team Lead for a live coding test and test your Automation and Non functional testing competencies.

body.title:
Tech Lead - Python
Tech Lead - Python
body.description:
About the job
Experience: 4.00 + years

Salary: Confidential (based on experience)

Expected Notice Period: 15 Days

Shift: (GMT+05:30) Asia/Kolkata (IST)

Opportunity Type: Remote

Placement Type: Full Time Indefinite Contract(40 hrs a week/160 hrs a month)

(*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' client - A world renowned tech talent company from USA)

What do you need for this opportunity?

Must have skills required:

NA, automation, Code Review, Quality Control, tool customisation, Leadership, Python, Quality Assurance

A world renowned tech talent company from USA is Looking for:

About The Company

Headquartered in Palo Alto, California, the company is the world's first AI-powered tech services organization. It has revolutionized the tech services industry by integrating AI into every aspect of its operations‚Äîoffering AI-vetted and matched talent, AI-driven development acceleration, and access to AI transformation experts who have played pivotal roles in building some of Silicon Valley's most iconic companies.

Since its founding in 2018, the company has achieved remarkable growth, boasting a Talent Cloud of over three million developers worldwide and serving 900+ clients. Its innovative approach and impactful contributions have earned it numerous accolades, including being named one of "America's Best Startup Employers" by Forbes in 2022, securing the top spot in The Information's 2021 Annual List of most promising B2B companies, and being featured in Fast Company's "World's Most Innovative Companies" list.

The company‚Äôs leadership team is a blend of top-tier AI technologists from organizations like Meta, Google, Microsoft, Apple, Amazon, and Twitter, alongside seasoned consultants from prestigious firms such as Accenture, Cognizant, Capgemini, McKinsey, and Bain, as well as alumni from renowned institutions like Stanford, Caltech, and MIT.

Required Skills

Technical Expertise: 4-8 years of strong experience in Python, with a proven ability to write clean, efficient code and optimize quality through comprehensive code reviews.
Code Review & Quality Control: Expertise in conducting code reviews to enhance performance and maintain high standards of data quality, with a focus on quality assurance practices.
Tool Customisation & Automation: Hands-on experience in customizing annotation tools and automating tasks to increase operational efficiency.
Leadership & Mentorship: Demonstrated ability to lead small teams of at least 3-5 developers, guide them through technical challenges, and mentor junior members to support their professional growth.
Conflict Resolution & Resource Management: Strong skills in resolving conflicts and managing resources to ensure timely delivery of high-quality outcomes.
Communication & Stakeholder Engagement: Adept at explaining complex technical issues to diverse audiences, delivering constructive feedback, and providing clear updates to stakeholders.
Cross-Functional Collaboration: Experience in collaborating with cross-functional teams, particularly in driving process improvements alongside engineering teams.


Experience required:

IC3: 4-6 years of experience
IC4: 6-8 years of experience


What does day-to-day life look like?

Code Review & Quality Assurance: Conduct thorough reviews of LLM code, provide feedback, and ensure adherence to quality standards.
Tool Optimisation: Implement customizations and automation to improve team workflows and efficiency.
Team Leadership: Lead a small team, providing technical guidance and setting clear expectations for project success.
Collaboration: Coordinate with engineering and other teams to ensure technical requirements for data are met.
Process Improvement: Continuously assess and enhance team processes and workflows to drive productivity.
Stakeholder Interaction: Regularly communicate project updates and address any technical requirements from stakeholders.


How to apply for this opportunity?

Register or login on our portal & fill out the application form.
Clear the given AI Interview (30 min) and Click on 'Apply' to get shortlisted
Once it's all done, your profile will be shared with the client for the Interview round.
When selected, just meet the client and get your exciting career started!


About Uplers:

Our goal is to make hiring reliable, simple, and fast. Our role will be to help all our talents find and apply for relevant contractual onsite opportunities and progress in their career. We will support any grievances or challenges you may face during the engagement. You will also be assigned to a dedicated Talent Success Coach during the engagement.

(Note: There are many more opportunities apart from this on the portal. Depending on the assessments you clear, you can apply for them as well).

So, if you are ready for a new challenge, a great work environment, and an opportunity to take your career to the next level, don't hesitate to apply today. We are waiting for you!

Desired Skills and Experience
NA, automation, Code Review, Quality Control, tool customisation, Leadership, Python, Quality Assurance

body.title:
Head of AI
Head of AI
body.description:
About the job
Experience: 10.00 + years

Salary: INR 5000000.00 / year (based on experience)

Expected Notice Period: 15 Days

Shift: (GMT+05:30) Asia/Kolkata (IST)

Opportunity Type: Remote

Placement Type: Full Time Permanent position(Payroll and Compliance to be managed by: RemoFirst)

(*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' client - Pet Health and Wellness Company)

What do you need for this opportunity?

Must have skills required:

Analytical Skills, automation, Ecommerce, GenAI, LangChain, Notion, Team management, Agile, Project management

Pet Health and Wellness Company is Looking for: 

About: 

We are a pet health and wellness company committed to providing innovative solutions for dogs. Our flagship product is an all-in-one powder supplement designed to support various aspects of canine health, including oral, joint, digestive, skin, and coat health. We are driven by a deep passion for pets and a mission to enhance their lives through high-quality, scientifically backed products.

Position Overview:

We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Head of AI to lead our AI initiatives, with a particular focus on project management and execution. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in AI, particularly within the e-commerce and Shopify domains. You will play a crucial role in shaping the future of our AI-powered platform and ensuring its alignment with our company''s vision and goals.

Key Responsibilities

 Oversee and manage the team, ensuring the smooth execution of projects and workflows.
 Develop and implement automation workflows, leveraging tools like LangChain, GenAI, and other AI frameworks.
 Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product, design, development, and marketing, to integrate AI features into our SaaS products.
 Design and execute AI solutions for the pet health and wellness industry, leveraging your understanding of the market and our target audience.
 Utilize tools such as Notion and Slack for efficient team communication and project tracking.
 Ensure projects adhere to Agile methodologies and are delivered on time with precision.
 Proactively identify opportunities for innovation and improvement in AI applications within the pet health and wellness sector.
 Showcase strong project management skills to manage stakeholders and cross-functional teams, ensuring alignment and efficient collaboration.


Qualifications

 A total of 10+ years of experience, includingt least 5 years in project management, with a proven track record of successfully leading and delivering e-commerce and Shopify projects.
 A minimum of 2 years in AI, specifically GenAI and related tools, demonstrating hands-on expertise in AI technologies.
 Prior experience working with US-based clients in the e-commerce industry, demonstrating a strong understanding of US work culture and client expectations.


Skills: 

 Proficiency in LangChain and automation workflows, showcasing the ability to develop and implement efficient AI solutions.
 Deep understanding of AI tools and technologies, with hands-on expertise in GenAI and other relevant frameworks.
 Strong project management and leadership skills, with the ability to manage stakeholders, cross-functional teams, and project timelines effectively.
 Excellent attention to detail and ability to interpret and execute complex tasks with minimal guidance.


How to apply for this opportunity?

Register or login on our portal & fill out the application form.
Clear the given AI Interview (30 min) and Click on 'Apply' to get shortlisted
Once it's all done, your profile will be shared with the client for the Interview round.
When selected, just meet the client and get your exciting career started!


About Uplers:

Our goal is to make hiring reliable, simple, and fast. Our role will be to help all our talents find and apply for relevant contractual onsite opportunities and progress in their career. We will support any grievances or challenges you may face during the engagement. You will also be assigned to a dedicated Talent Success Coach during the engagement.

(Note: There are many more opportunities apart from this on the portal. Depending on the assessments you clear, you can apply for them as well).

So, if you are ready for a new challenge, a great work environment, and an opportunity to take your career to the next level, don't hesitate to apply today. We are waiting for you!

Desired Skills and Experience
Analytical Skills, automation, Ecommerce, GenAI, LangChain, Notion, Team management, Agile, Project management
